code: var useNotification=function useNotification(title,option){if(!("Notification"in window)){return;}if(Notification.permission!=="granted"){try{Notification.requestPermission().then(function(permission){if(permission!=='granted')return;});}catch(error){if(error instanceof TypeError){Notification.requestPermission(function(permission){if(permission!=='granted')return;});}else{console.error(error);}}}else{new Notification(title,option);}};export default useNotification;
